ygData.subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat
ygData.msgSnippet: He swallowed. He didn t know what he could do. Do not be angry with me. But we must discuss this. I care for you too much at this point to see you make this

Message-ID: <de.b83be42.272b9a15@...>

Subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: kinger01030@...

 He swallowed. He didn't know what he could do. "Do not be angry with me. But 
we must discuss this. I care for you too much at this point to see you make 
this mistake. Megatron will only cause your death. I am aware of your clone 
of yourself." he went on a knee and lowered his head..."I will not let it 
come to that and that is why I need you to trust in my judgment. I know that 
why you chose me for advisor. But also if you keep makeing plans against the 
maximals than my total plan woll fall apart. Even if you try to destroy the 
maximals the allaincw will always end up saveing them. So we must attack the 
head. Destroy the alliance first. Then the maximals." he stood up and awaited 
for a responce.
